column1: brought the said rice pounder from the house. Therefore the first accused

column2: could not have been convicted under section 296 of the Penal Code. Only

column1: the fourth  accused  who dealt the  blow to  the  head  of the deceased can
be convicted  under section 296 of the  Penal Code.

column2: For the  afore  stated  reasons  I set aside  the  conviction  of the first

column1: accused  appellant  and  convict  him  under  section  297
homicide not amounting to murder and sentence him to ten years RI.  The
first accused appellant's conviction  under section 296 is affirmed .

With 
the  above  variation 
to

JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
